steps.title: First you want to pick out a pair of cleats that you like.
steps.content: First you want to pick out a pair of cleats that you like. Pick a good brand that you like and will wear.

steps.title: Figure out the size.
steps.content: Figure out the size. Your cleats should be tight. Not so tight that they hurt your feet, but they should be close fitting. If your cleats are too big then you could have a hard time kicking the ball properly. [1] X Research source

steps.title: Put the shoe on and stand up.
steps.content: Put the shoe on and stand up. When you are standing, feel where your toe is in the shoe. Your toe should be very close to the top. It should be either at the top or there should be just a very little bit of space. [2] X Research source

steps.title: Try on a few different sizes and try moving around in them.
steps.content: Try on a few different sizes and try moving around in them. If they feel good then they are probably a good size for you! [3] X Research source
